title: I Have These 15 Under-$50 Gifts Bookmarked and Ready to Go
description: I Have These 15 Under-$50 Gifts Bookmarked and Ready to Go
excerpt: If you're shopping for a lot of people this holiday season, consider this guide of under-$50 gifts your saving grace.
text: I know we're only a few weeks into November, but I've been shopping for gifts since the minute October came to an end. I like to start early so I can figure out how to maximize the gift-giving joy by being intentional about my purchases. Plus, I have more than 15 people on my list this year, so I've been on the hunt for affordable items that pack a punch.From colorful Old Navy scarves to the viral sunglasses style I've been spotting everywhere, this carefully curated selection of under-$50 gifts is guaranteed to work for everyone on your list. Whether you're shopping for your mom or even looking for a little stocking stuffer for yourself, let the 15 items below inspire you to get an early start on gift shopping this season. A pop of color is always a good idea. Old Navy Ribbed Pajama Top I love a good pajama set, and this one is a favorite. For the candle lover who doesn't want anything floral. Crown Affair The Leave-In Conditioner Cream This is a luxe gift that won't set your budget over the edge. Flamingo Estate Roma Heirloom Tomato Hand Soap This is an easy housewarming gift. Zara Home Faux Shearling Slippers Shopbop Aire Whirlpool Sunglasses The viral sunglasses. Gift these to the style setter on your list. Madewell Medium Perfect Leather Belt A classic leather belt will always leave a good impression. Open Edit Ridge Hoop Earrings Chic earrings for the maximalist in your life. These will never go out of style. Zara Basic 20 Denier Tights Everyone will be happy with a fresh new pair of chic tights ahead of the holidays. Service Projects The Arlo A trinket for the person who has it all. J.Crew Satin Bow Hair Clips These are so luxe, I can't look away. Lele Sadoughi Lily Claw Clip *Adds to my wish list immediately*. Goop G.Tox Ultimate Dry Brush For the wellness guru in your life. Nayiri is Who What Wear's senior fashion editor for branded content and based in her hometown, Los Angeles. It all began in 2014 when she landed an internship at the company and never looked back. While she does love writing her fair share of fashion stories, her heart really belongs in the brainstorm room, where she has fun strategizing different ways to create content with our fashion partners so that you engage with the brands you know and love. Her style tends to be more classic (she loves a good black-and-white look with gold accessories), and white pumps are kind of her thing. If she had to pick one person's wardrobe to raid, it would be Rosie Huntington-Whiteley's, and she also has a major obsession with interior design. She's a mom to a 1-year-old baby girl named Sophie, and she fully plans on training her to spot fashion trends by the time she's 10. That's all!
html:
I know we're only a few weeks into November, but I've been shopping for gifts since the minute October came to an end. I like to start early so I can figure out how to maximize the gift-giving joy by being intentional about my purchases. Plus, I have more than 15 people on my list this year, so I've been on the hunt for affordable items that pack a punch.

From colorful Old Navy scarves to the viral sunglasses style I've been spotting everywhere, this carefully curated selection of under-$50 gifts is guaranteed to work for everyone on your list. Whether you're shopping for your mom or even looking for a little stocking stuffer for yourself, let the 15 items below inspire you to get an early start on gift shopping this season.

A pop of color is always a good idea.

Old Navy

Ribbed Pajama Top

I love a good pajama set, and this one is a favorite.

For the candle lover who doesn't want anything floral.

Crown Affair

The Leave-In Conditioner Cream

This is a luxe gift that won't set your budget over the edge.

Flamingo Estate

Roma Heirloom Tomato Hand Soap

This is an easy housewarming gift.

Zara Home

Faux Shearling Slippers

Shopbop

Aire Whirlpool Sunglasses

The viral sunglasses. Gift these to the style setter on your list.

Madewell

Medium Perfect Leather Belt

A classic leather belt will always leave a good impression.

Open Edit

Ridge Hoop Earrings

Chic earrings for the maximalist in your life.

These will never go out of style.

Zara

Basic 20 Denier Tights

Everyone will be happy with a fresh new pair of chic tights ahead of the holidays.

Service Projects

The Arlo

A trinket for the person who has it all.

J.Crew

Satin Bow Hair Clips

These are so luxe, I can't look away.

Lele Sadoughi

Lily Claw Clip

*Adds to my wish list immediately*.

Goop

G.Tox Ultimate Dry Brush

For the wellness guru in your life.

Nayiri is Who What Wear's senior fashion editor for branded content and based in her hometown, Los Angeles. It all began in 2014 when she landed an internship at the company and never looked back. While she does love writing her fair share of fashion stories, her heart really belongs in the brainstorm room, where she has fun strategizing different ways to create content with our fashion partners so that you engage with the brands you know and love. Her style tends to be more classic (she loves a good black-and-white look with gold accessories), and white pumps are kind of her thing. If she had to pick one person's wardrobe to raid, it would be Rosie Huntington-Whiteley's, and she also has a major obsession with interior design. She's a mom to a 1-year-old baby girl named Sophie, and she fully plans on training her to spot fashion trends by the time she's 10. That's all!
